info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 03 at 8:36PM MDT until July 03 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 900 PM MDT FOR NORTHERN FALLON AND EAST CENTRAL CUSTER COUNTIES... At 836 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Carlyle to 18 miles southeast of Terry, moving east at 15 mph. Storm chasers shared video of a wall cloud with this storm. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ismay, Ollie and Westmore. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
